33  // Perform interpolated table lookup at current read index
34  // to find output sample
35  const float y = lookup(idx);
36 
37  // Increment current read index
38  idx += delta;
39 
40  // Keep index from wrapping erroneously due to overflow

44  }

Definition at line 57 of file OscWavetable.cpp.

58  {
59  // Split index into integer and fractional parts
60  const int idx_int = static_cast<int>(index);
61  const float idx_frac = index - idx_int;
62 
63  // Wrap indices
64  const int idx0 = idx_int % SINE4096_LEN;
65  const int idx1 = (idx_int + 1) % SINE4096_LEN;
66 
67  // Read adjacent samples
68  const float x0 = wavetable[idx0];
69  const float x1 = wavetable[idx1];
70 
71  // Interpolate to find output
72  const float y = bdsp::maps::map_linear_norm_pos(idx_frac, x0, x1);

74  return y;
